text: Perpetuous Dreamer was an alias of Armin van Buuren, which is known for the song "The Sound Of Goodbye". The track went to number one on the US dance chart.. As with most early electronic music releases in the pre internet era, the use of aliases has created very confusing names for the mixes over the years of re-releasing tracks. == Discography == The discography below aims to collect the releases by Armin van Buuren on this alias.
